    <div><div class="footerContainer"></div><hr class="pageBreak" style="margin:18pt 0pt; ct-page-break: true; page-break-after: always;" /><div class="headerContainer"></div></div>
    <div><p dir="ltr" style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', 'serif';font-size: 12pt;line-height: 108%;margin-bottom: .001pt;margin-left: 0;margin-right: 0;margin-top: 0;"><span style="white-space:pre-wrap; font-size: 12pt;font-style: normal;font-weight: normal;margin: 0;padding: 0;"> </span></p><p dir="ltr" style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', 'serif';font-size: 10pt;line-height: 108%;margin-bottom: .001pt;margin-left: 0;margin-right: 0;margin-top: 12pt;"><span style="white-space:pre-wrap; font-family: 'Times New Roman', 'serif';font-size: 10pt;font-style: normal;font-weight: bold;margin: 0;padding: 0;">Item&#160;2.02 Results of Operations and Financial Condition. </span></p><p dir="ltr" style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', 'serif';font-size: 10pt;line-height: 108%;margin-bottom: .001pt;margin-left: 0;margin-right: 0;margin-top: 6pt;text-indent: 0.50in;"><span style="white-space:pre-wrap; font-family: 'Times New Roman', 'serif';font-size: 10pt;font-style: normal;font-weight: normal;margin: 0;padding: 0;">On February 08, 2022, Chipotle Mexican Grill, Inc. issued a press release announcing earnings and other financial results for our fourth quarter and fiscal year ended December 31, 2021 and announcing that management would review these results in a conference call at 4:30 pm Eastern time on February 08, 2022. A copy of the press release is being filed as Exhibit 99.1 to this Form 8-K.</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', 'serif';font-size: 10pt;line-height: 107.9%;margin-bottom: 0;margin-left: 0;margin-right: 0;margin-top: 12pt;"><span style="white-space:pre-wrap; font-family: 'Times New Roman', 'serif';font-size: 10pt;font-style: normal;font-weight: bold;margin: 0;padding: 0;">Item 8.01 Other Events.&#160; </span></p><p dir="ltr" style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', 'serif';font-size: 10pt;line-height: 107.9%;margin-bottom: 0;margin-left: 0;margin-right: 0;margin-top: 6pt;text-indent: 0.50in;"><span style="white-space:pre-wrap; font-family: 'Times New Roman', 'serif';font-size: 10pt;font-style: normal;font-weight: normal;margin: 0;padding: 0;">On February 08, 2022, we announced that our Board of Directors has authorized repurchases of common stock with a total aggregate purchase price of $200 million, exclusive of commissions. This repurchase authorization is in addition to previously announced repurchase authorizations. The repurchase program may be modified, suspended, or discontinued at any time.</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', 'serif';font-size: 10pt;line-height: 108%;margin-bottom: .001pt;margin-left: 0;margin-right: 0;margin-top: 12pt;"><span style="white-space:pre-wrap; 		<p style="margin:0pt;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;text-align:center;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 12pt">
			<font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;text-transform:uppercase;color:#6E3F28;font-size:12pt;">Chipotle ANNOUNCES FOURTH QUARTER </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;text-transform:uppercase;color:#6E3F28;font-size:12pt;">AND FULL YEAR </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;text-transform:uppercase;color:#6E3F28;font-size:12pt;">20</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;text-transform:uppercase;color:#6E3F28;font-size:12pt;">21</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;text-transform:uppercase;color:#6E3F28;font-size:12pt;"> RESULTS</font>
		</p>
		<p style="margin:0pt;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;text-align:center;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 12pt">
			<font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;text-transform:uppercase;color:#6E3F28;font-size:12pt;">FY21 Total revenue increased 26.1% YEAR-OVER-YEAR to $7.5 BILLION</font>
		</p>
		<p style="margin:0pt;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;text-align:center;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 12pt">
			<font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;text-transform:uppercase;color:#6E3F28;font-size:12pt;">TOTAL NORTH AMERICAN OPPORTUNITY EXPANDED TO 7,000 REStAURANTS WITH annual unit growth of 8% to 10% </font>
		</p>
		<p style="margin:0pt;border-bottom:1pt solid #996633 ;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 12pt">
			<font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;text-transform:uppercase;color:#6E3F28;font-size:12pt;">&#xFEFF;</font>
		</p>
		<p style="margin:4.5pt 0pt 0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">
			<font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">NEWPORT BEACH, Calf. &#x2013; February 8, 2022 &#x2013; Chipotle Mexican Grill, Inc. (NYSE: CMG) today reported financial results for its fourth quarter and fiscal year ended December 31, 2021.</font>
		</p>
		<p style="margin:13.5pt 0pt 0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">
			<font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;font-weight:bold;color:#000000;">Fourth quarter highlights, year over year: </font>

inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">$10.73</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">.</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;font-size:5pt;vertical-align:super;line-height:100%">1 &nbsp;</font></p></td></tr></table></div>
		<div style="width:100%"><table style="width:100%; table-layout: fixed;" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0"><tr><td style="width:18pt;"><p style="width:18pt;font-size:0pt;"></p></td><td valign="top" align="left" style="width: 18.00pt;">
			<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt;margin:4.5pt 0pt 9pt;">
				<font style="margin:4.5pt 0pt 9pt;font-family:Symbol;font-size:10pt;;"> &#xB7;</font>
			</p>
		</td><td style="width:0pt;"><p style="width:0pt;width:0pt;font-size:0pt;"></p></td><td align="left" valign="top">
			<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt;margin:4.5pt 0pt 9pt;">
			<font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">Opened </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">215</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;"> new restaurants </font></p></td></tr></table></div>
		<p style="margin:4.5pt 0pt 9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">
			<font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;font-size:8pt;color:#000000;font-size:4pt;vertical-align:super;line-height:100%">1</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;font-size:8pt;color:#000000;">&nbsp;</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;font-style:italic;font-size:8pt;color:#000000;">Restaurant level operating margin, adjusted net income and adjusted diluted earnings per share are non-GAAP financial measures. Reconciliations to GAAP measures and further information are set forth in the table at the end of this press release.</font>
		</p>
		<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">
			<a name="_Hlk30676915"></a><a name="_Hlk504391754"></a>
		</p>
		<p><font size="1"> </font></p><div style="width:100%">

		<p style="margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 12pt">

			<font style="display: inline;">&nbsp;</font>

		</p>

</div><hr size="3" style="color:#999999" width="100%" align="center"></hr><p style="page-break-after:always">&nbsp;</p><div style="width:100%">

		<p style="margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">

			<font style="display: inline;">&nbsp;</font>

		</p>

</div>
		<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;;font-size: 10pt"><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">&#x201C;2021 was an outstanding year for Chipotle, highlighting the strength and resiliency</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;"> of</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;"> our brand. </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">Together, we accomplished many incredible things as our passionate employees remained dedicated to delivering excellent guest experiences, </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">aligned with our purpose and values,&#x201D; said Brian Niccol, Chairman and Chief Executive Officer, Chipotle.&nbsp;&#x201C;</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">Moving forward</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">, &nbsp;</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">we believe </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">expanding access and convenience through our digital ecosystem, accelerating unit growth, and </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">continuing to develop and support our restaurant employees,</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">&nbsp;</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">will </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">p</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">ut </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">us in a </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">much </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">stronger competitive position.&#x201D;</font>
		</p>
		<p style="margin:9pt 0pt 4.5pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">
			<font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;font-weight:bold;color:#000000;">Development Update:</font>
		</p>
		<p style="margin:4.5pt 0pt 9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">
			<font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">Based on the success of small-town locations that are delivering unit economics at or better than traditional </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">Chipotle </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">locations, we provide the following update to our long-term development opportunity:</font>
		</p>
		<div style="width:100%"><table style="width:100%; table-layout: fixed;" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0"><tr><td style="width:18pt;"><p style="width:18pt;font-size:0pt;"></p></td><td valign="top" align="left" style="width: 18.00pt;">
			<p style="border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt;margin:4.5pt 0pt 0pt;">
				<font style="margin:4.5pt 0pt 9pt;font-family:Symbol;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9;color:#000000;font-size:10pt;;"> &#xB7;</font>
			</p>
		</td><td style="width:0pt;"><p style="width:0pt;width:0pt;font-size:0pt;"></p></td><td align="left" valign="top">
			<p style="border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt;margin:4.5pt 0pt 0pt;">
			<font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">Over time, w</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">e believe there can be at least 7,000 Chipotle restaurants in North America, up from the prior goal of 6,000 restaurants.</font></p></td></tr></table></div>
		<div style="width:100%"><table style="width:100%; table-layout: fixed;" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0"><tr><td style="width:18pt;"><p style="width:18pt;font-size:0pt;"></p></td><td valign="top" align="left" style="width: 18.00pt;">
			<p style="border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt;margin:4.5pt 0pt 0pt;">
				<font style="margin:4.5pt 0pt 9pt;font-family:Symbol;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9;color:#000000;font-size:10pt;;"> &#xB7;</font>
			</p>
		</td><td style="width:0pt;"><p style="width:0pt;width:0pt;font-size:0pt;"></p></td><td align="left" valign="top">
			<p style="border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt;margin:4.5pt 0pt 0pt;">
			<font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">Given the healthy and improving cash on cash returns, we are building a real estate pipeline that will allow us to accelerate unit growth to be in the range of 8% to 10% per year, with greater than 80% of new restaurants having a Chipotlane.</font></p></td></tr></table></div>
		<p style="margin:9pt 0pt 4.5pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">
			<font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;font-weight:bold;color:#000000;">COVID-19 and Liquidity Update:</font>
		</p>
		<p style="margin:4.5pt 0pt 9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">
			<font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">Given the resurgence in COVID</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">-19</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;"> cases during the fourth quarter due to the Omicron variant, the health and well-being of our employees and guests remains our top priority. Beyond the investments made in our people, restaurants, and supply chain, we are closely following the recommendations of the CDC and local health departments. We have implemented and enhanced numerous protocols that give our employees and guests confidence that Chipotle remains steadfast in our commitment to keep them safe as in-restaurant ordering and dining increases.</font>
		</p>
		<p style="margin:4.5pt 0pt 9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">
			<font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">As of December 31, 2021, Chipotle continues to maintain a strong financial position with $1.</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">4</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;"> billion in cash, investments and restricted cash, and no debt. We also have access to a $500 million untapped credit facility. Our financial strength gives us the opportunity to make on-going strategic investments in our people, business, and communities, which we believe will benefit us for years to come. </font>
		</p>
		<p style="margin:9pt 0pt 4.5pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">
			<a name="_Hlk87358549"></a><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;font-weight:bold;color:#000000;">Results for the three months ended December 31, 2021:</font>
		</p>
		<p style="margin:4.5pt 0pt 9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">
			<font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">Total revenue in the fourth quarter was $2.0 billion, an increase of 22.0% compared to the fourth quarter of 20</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">20</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">. The increase in total revenue was driven by a 15.2% increase in comparable restaurant sales and new restaurant openings. Comparable restaurant sales were fairly consistent in each month of the fourth quarter due to a combination of factors including healthy demand for </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">Smoked Brisket</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">, strength in digital sales, and the benefit of menu price increase</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">s</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">. Comparable restaurant sales </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">began to moderate in the back half of December as the number of Omicron cases spiked. This trend intensified through January 2022, which also included challenging weather across the country. Assuming the effects of the pandemic continue to subside,</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;"> we expect first quarter 202</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">2</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;"> comparable restaurant sales to be in the </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">mid to high single</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">&nbsp;</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">digits </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">range</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">.</font>
		</p>
		<p style="margin:4.5pt 0pt 9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">
			<font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">Digital sales grew </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">3.8</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">% year over year to $81</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">1</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">.</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">3</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;"> million and represented 4</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">1.6</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">% of sales. A</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">bout</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;"> half of the digital sales were from order ahead transactions as guests appreciate both the convenience and value offered by this channel, as well as the added convenience of more Chipotlanes.</font>
		</p>
		<p style="margin:4.5pt 0pt 9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">
			<font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">We opened </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">78</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;"> new restaurants during the fourth quarter </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">with</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">&nbsp;</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">67</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">&nbsp;</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">(or 86%) </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">includ</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">ing</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;"> a Chipotlane. </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">These formats continue to perform very well and are helping </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">enhance guest access and convenience, as well as increase new restaurant sales, margins, and returns. </font>
		</p>
		<p style="margin:4.5pt 0pt 9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">
			<font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">Food, beverage and packaging costs in the fourth quarter were 31.6% of total revenue, a</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">n</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">&nbsp;</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">in</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">crease of 60 basis points compared to the fourth quarter of 20</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">20</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">. The </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">in</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">crease was due primarily to</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;"> elevated inflation on beef and freight, and to a lesser extent, avocado </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">costs that more than offset the leverage from menu price increases.</font>
		</p>
		<p style="margin:4.5pt 0pt 9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">
			<font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">Restaurant level operating margin was </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">20.2</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">%, an increase from 19.5% in the fourth quarter of 20</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">20</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">.&nbsp;The improvement was driven primarily by leverage from comparable restaurant sales</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;"> and</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;"> menu price increases, partially offset by </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">wage inflation and higher commodity costs largely due to beef and freight</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">. &nbsp;</font>
		</p>
		<p style="margin:4.5pt 0pt 9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">

		</p>
		<p><font size="1"> </font></p><div style="width:100%">

		<p style="margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 12pt">

			<font style="display: inline;">&nbsp;</font>

		</p>

</div><hr size="3" style="color:#999999" width="100%" align="center"></hr><p style="page-break-after:always">&nbsp;</p><div style="width:100%">

		<p style="margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">

			<font style="display: inline;">&nbsp;</font>

		</p>

</div>
		<p style="margin:4.5pt 0pt 9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;;font-size: 10pt"><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">General and administrative expenses for the fourth quarter were&nbsp;$1</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">59.8</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;"> million&nbsp;on a GAAP basis, or&nbsp;$1</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">32.8</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;"> million</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;font-size:5pt;vertical-align:super;line-height:100%">2</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">&nbsp;on a non-GAAP basis, excluding&nbsp;$</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">1</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">8</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">.0</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;"> million related to </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">the proposed settlement of legal </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">matters</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">, $7.6 million for a COVID-19 related modification made in December 2020 to the 2018 performance shares,</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;"> and&nbsp;$</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">1.3</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;"> million&nbsp;related to transformation expenses, restaurant closure costs and certain other costs. GAAP and non-GAAP general and administrative expenses for the fourth quarter of 202</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">1</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;"> also include </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">$99.9 million of </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">underlying general and administrative expenses,&nbsp;$2</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">9</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">.7 million&nbsp;</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">of </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">non-cash stock compensation</font><a name="_Hlk62289715"></a><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">,&nbsp;</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">$1</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">.</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">8 million related to higher bonus accruals as well as payroll taxes on equity vesting and stock option exercises, and $1.4 million related to the </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">upcoming all-manager conference. </font>
		</p>
		<p style="margin:4.5pt 0pt 9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">
			<font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">The GAAP effective income tax rate was </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">20.3</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">% in the fourth quarter of 202</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">1</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">, compared to </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">negative 62.2</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">% in the fourth quarter of 20</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">20</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">.</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">&nbsp;</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">The increase in the tax rate</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;"> was</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;"> primarily due to the tax benefit </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">recorded</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;"> last year for the 2020 federal net operating loss generated and carried back to prior years. This </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">was partially</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;"> offset by a net reduction in tax expense mostly related to the write-off of uncertain tax position reserves and more equity vesting and exercises in the fourth quarter of 2021</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">.</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;"> On a non-GAAP basis, the 202</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">1</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;"> fourth quarter effective income tax rate was </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">18.7</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">%</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;font-size:5pt;vertical-align:super;line-height:100%">2</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">.&nbsp;</font>
		</p>
		<p style="margin:4.5pt 0pt 9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">
			<font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">Net income for the fourth quarter of 2021 was $133.5 million, or $4.69 per diluted share, a </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">de</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">crease from $191.0 million, or $6.69 per diluted share</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">, which included an income tax benefit of $3.77 per diluted share</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">, in the fourth quarter of 2</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">020</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">. &nbsp;</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">Excluding the impact of legal expenses, modification expenses</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;"> related to our 2018 PSUs</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">, corporate restructuring, and </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">restaurant asset impairment</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">, adjusted</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;"> net income </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">for the fourth quarter 2021 </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">was $</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">159.1</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;"> million and adjusted diluted earnings per share was $</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">5</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">.</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">5</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">8.</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;font-weight:bold;color:#000000;">&nbsp;</font>
		</p>
		<p style="margin:4.5pt 0pt 9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">
			<a name="_Hlk87358571"></a><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">During the quarter, our Board of Directors approved the investment of up to an additional $200</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">.0</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;"> million, exclusive of commissions, to repurchase shares of our common stock, subject to market conditions. Including this repurchase authorization, $2</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">40.9</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;"> million was available as of December 31, 2021. The repurchase authorization may be modified, suspended, or discontinued at any time. We repurchased $</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">168.9</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;"> million of stock at an average price per share of $1,750 during the fourth quarter.</font>
		</p>
		<p style="margin:4.5pt 0pt 9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">
			<font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;font-weight:bold;color:#000000;">Results for the full year ended December 31, 2021:</font>
		</p>
		<p style="margin:4.5pt 0pt 9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">
			<font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">Total revenue for 2021 was $7.5 billion, an increase of 26.1% compared to 2020. The increase in total revenue was driven by a 19.3% increase in comparable restaurant sales and new restaurant openings.</font>
		</p>
		<p style="margin:4.5pt 0pt 9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">
			<font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">Digital sales grew </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">2</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">4.</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">7</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">% year over year to $</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">3.4</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;"> billion and represented 4</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">5.6</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">% of sales. About half of the digital sales were from order ahead transactions as guests better understand the value offered by this channel, as well as the added convenience of more Chipotlanes.</font>
		</p>
		<p style="margin:4.5pt 0pt 9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">
			<font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">We opened </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">215</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;"> new restaurants during the year, bringing the total restaurant count at year-end to 2,966. Of the </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">215</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;"> new restaurants opened during the year, </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">174</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;"> (or </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">81</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">%) included a Chipotlane. </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">We had</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;"> a total of </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">355</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;"> Chipotlanes as of year-end.</font>
		</p>
		<p style="margin:4.5pt 0pt 9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">
			<font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">Food, beverage and packaging costs were 30.6% of total revenue, a decrease of 170 basis points compared to 20</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">20</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">. The decrease was </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">largely </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">driven by </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">leverage from </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">menu price increases, </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">which was </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">partially offset b</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">y higher </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">freight and </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">beef costs. </font>
		</p>
		<p style="margin:4.5pt 0pt 9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">
			<font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">Restaurant level operating margin was 22.6%, an increase from 17.4% in 2020. </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">The improvement was driven primarily by leverage from comparable restaurant sales </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">and</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;"> menu price increases, partially offset by </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">wage inflation, higher commodity inflation primarily from freight and beef, as well as</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;"> increased delivery expenses. </font>
		</p>
		<p style="margin:4.5pt 0pt 9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">
			<font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">General and administrative expenses were&nbsp;$</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">606.9</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;"> million&nbsp;on a GAAP basis, or&nbsp;$</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">518.0</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;"> million</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;font-size:5pt;vertical-align:super;line-height:100%">2</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">&nbsp;on a non-GAAP basis, excluding&nbsp;</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">$63.1 million for a COVID-19 related modification made in December 2020 to the 2018 performance shares, </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">$</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">20.1</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;"> million related to </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">various legal </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">matters</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">, &nbsp;</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">and&nbsp;$</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">5.6</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;"> million&nbsp;related to transformation expenses, restaurant closure costs and certain other costs. GAAP and non-GAAP general and administrative expenses for </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">full year</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;"> 202</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">1</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;"> also include </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">$380.8 million of </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">underlying general and administrative expenses,&nbsp;$</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">109.5</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;"> million&nbsp;</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">of </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">non-cash stock compensation,&nbsp;</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;">$24.9</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;"> million related to higher bonus accruals as well as payroll taxes on equity vesting and stock option exercises, and $2.9 million related to the </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">upcoming all-manager conference. </font>
		</p>
		<p style="margin:4.5pt 0pt 9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">
			<a name="_Hlk505335379"></a><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">The GAAP effective income tax rate was 1</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">9.7</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">% in 202</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">1</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">, compared to negative 21.1% in 20</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">20</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">. The increase in the tax rate </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">was</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;"> primarily due to</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">&nbsp;</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">the tax benefit booked last year for the 2020 federal net operating loss generated and carried back to prior years</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">, as well as the proportionality of the excess tax benefits from equity vesting and exercises relative to profit before tax in each respective year. T</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">his </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">was partially</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;"> offset by a net reduction in tax expense mostly related to the write-off of uncertain tax position reserves in 2021.</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;"> On a non-GAAP basis, the 202</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">1</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;"> full year effective income tax rate was </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">20.0</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">%.</font>
		</p>
		<p style="margin:4.5pt 0pt 9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">
			<font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;font-size:8pt;font-size:4pt;vertical-align:super;line-height:100%">2</font><font style="display: inline;font-size:8pt;">&nbsp;</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;font-style:italic;color:#000000;font-size:8pt;">Non-GAAP general and administrative expenses and non-GAAP effective income tax rate are non-GAAP measures. Reconciliations to GAAP measures and further information are set forth in the table at the end of this press release.</font>
		</p>
		<p style="margin:4.5pt 0pt 9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">

		</p>
		<p><font size="1"> </font></p><div style="width:100%">

		</p>

		</p>

</div>
		<p style="margin:4.5pt 0pt 9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;;font-size: 10pt"><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">Net income for 202</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">1</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;"> was $653.0 million, or $22.90 per diluted share, compared to net income of $355.8 million, or $12.52 per diluted share for 20</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">20</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">. Excluding the impact of</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">&nbsp;</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">modification expenses</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;"> related to our 2018 PSUs, legal expenses, </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">corporate restructuring, restaurant asset impairment, and certain other costs, adjusted net income </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">for 2021 </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">was $</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">724.8</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;"> million and adjusted diluted earnings per share was $</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">25.42</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">.</font>
		</p>
		<p style="margin:4.5pt 0pt 9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">
			<font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">More information will be available in our Annual Report on Form 10-K, which we expect to file with the SEC by February </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">11</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">, 202</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">2</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">. &nbsp;</font>
		</p>
		<p style="margin:13.5pt 0pt 0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">

				<font style="margin:4.5pt 0pt 0pt;font-family:Symbol;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9;color:#000000;font-size:10pt;;"> &#xB7;</font>

			<p style="border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt;margin:4.5pt 0pt 0pt;">
			<font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">Between 235 to 250</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;"> new restaurant openings</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;"> (including 5 to 10 relocations to add a Chipotlane), which assumes construction and permit delays related to COVID-19 don&#x2019;t worsen</font></p></td></tr></table></div>
		<div style="width:100%"><table style="width:100%; table-layout: fixed;" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0"><tr><td style="width:18pt;"><p style="width:18pt;font-size:0pt;"></p></td><td valign="top" align="left" style="width: 18.00pt;">
			<p style="border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt;margin:4.5pt 0pt 0pt;">

			<font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">An estimated underlying effective full year tax rate between 25% and 27% </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">before discrete items</font></p></td></tr></table></div>
		<p style="margin:13.5pt 0pt 0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">
			<font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;font-weight:bold;color:#000000;">Definitions</font>
		</p>
		<p style="margin:4.5pt 0pt 0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">
			<font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">The</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;"> following definitions apply to these terms as used throughout this release:</font>
		</p>
		<div style="width:100%"><table style="width:100%; table-layout: fixed;" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0"><tr><td style="width:18pt;"><p style="width:18pt;font-size:0pt;"></p></td><td valign="top" align="left" style="width: 18.00pt;">
			<p style="border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt;margin:4.5pt 0pt 0pt;">
				<font style="margin:4.5pt 0pt 0pt;font-family:Symbol;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9;color:#000000;font-size:10pt;;"> &#xB7;</font>
			</p>
		</td><td style="width:0pt;"><p style="width:0pt;width:0pt;font-size:0pt;"></p></td><td align="left" valign="top">
			<p style="border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt;margin:4.5pt 0pt 0pt;">
			<font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;font-weight:bold;color:#000000;">Comparable restaurant sales, or sales comps, and comparable restaurant transactions, </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">represent the change in period-over-period total revenue or transactions for restaurants in operation for at least 13 full calendar months.</font></p></td></tr></table></div>
		<div style="width:100%"><table style="width:100%; table-layout: fixed;" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0"><tr><td style="width:18pt;"><p style="width:18pt;font-size:0pt;"></p></td><td valign="top" align="left" style="width: 18.00pt;">
			<p style="border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt;margin:13.5pt 0pt 0pt;">
				<font style="margin:13.5pt 0pt 0pt;font-family:Symbol;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9;color:#000000;font-size:10pt;;"> &#xB7;</font>
			</p>
		</td><td style="width:0pt;"><p style="width:0pt;width:0pt;font-size:0pt;"></p></td><td align="left" valign="top">
			<p style="border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt;margin:13.5pt 0pt 0pt;">
			<font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;font-weight:bold;color:#000000;">Average restaurant sales </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">refer to the average trailing 12-month food and beverage revenue for restaurants in operation for at least 12 full calendar months.</font></p></td></tr></table></div>
		<div style="width:100%"><table style="width:100%; table-layout: fixed;" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0"><tr><td style="width:18pt;"><p style="width:18pt;font-size:0pt;"></p></td><td valign="top" align="left" style="width: 18.00pt;">
			<p style="border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt;margin:13.5pt 0pt 0pt;">
				<font style="margin:13.5pt 0pt 0pt;font-family:Symbol;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9;color:#000000;font-size:10pt;;"> &#xB7;</font>
			</p>
		</td><td style="width:0pt;"><p style="width:0pt;width:0pt;font-size:0pt;"></p></td><td align="left" valign="top">
			<p style="border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt;margin:13.5pt 0pt 0pt;">
			<font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;font-weight:bold;color:#000000;">Restaurant level operating margin</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;"> represents total revenue less direct restaurant operating costs, expressed as a percent of total revenue.</font></p></td></tr></table></div>
		<div style="width:100%"><table style="width:100%; table-layout: fixed;" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0"><tr><td style="width:18pt;"><p style="width:18pt;font-size:0pt;"></p></td><td valign="top" align="left" style="width: 18.00pt;">
			<p style="border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt;margin:13.5pt 0pt 0pt;">
				<font style="margin:13.5pt 0pt 0pt;font-family:Symbol;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9;color:#000000;font-size:10pt;;"> &#xB7;</font>
			</p>
		</td><td style="width:0pt;"><p style="width:0pt;width:0pt;font-size:0pt;"></p></td><td align="left" valign="top">
			<p style="border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt;margin:13.5pt 0pt 0pt;">
			<font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;font-weight:bold;color:#000000;">Digital sales</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;"> represent food and beverage revenue generated through the Chipotle website, Chipotle app or third-party delivery aggregators. Digital sales exclude revenue deferrals associated with Chipotle Rewards. </font></p></td></tr></table></div>
		<p style="margin:13.5pt 0pt 0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">
			<font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;font-weight:bold;color:#000000;">Conference Call Details</font>
		</p>
		<p style="margin:4.5pt 0pt 9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">
			<font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">Chipotle</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">&nbsp;</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">will</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;"> host a conference call on Tuesday, February </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">8</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">, 202</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">2</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">, at 4:30 PM Eastern time</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">&nbsp;</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">to discuss fourth quarter and full year 202</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">1</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;"> financial results</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">, as well as provide a business update for the 2022 first quarter to date.</font>
		</p>
		<p style="margin:4.5pt 0pt 9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">
			<font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">The</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">&nbsp;</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">conference</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;"> call can be accessed live over the phone by dialing 1-888-317-6003 or for international callers by dialing 1-412-317-6061 and use code: </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">7541344</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">. The call will be webcast live from the company's website on the investor relations page at ir.chipotle.com/events. An archived webcast will be available approximately one hour after the end of the call.</font>
		</p>
		<p style="margin:13.5pt 0pt 0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">
			<font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;font-weight:bold;color:#000000;">About Chipotle</font>
		</p>
		<p style="margin:4.5pt 0pt 0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">
			<font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;color:#000000;">Chipotle Mexican Grill, Inc. (NYSE: CMG) is cultivating a better world by serving responsibly sourced, classically-cooked, real food with wholesome ingredients without artificial colors, flavors or preservatives. Chipotle had over 2,950 restaurants as of December 31, 2021, in the United States, Canada, the United Kingdom, France and Germany and is the only restaurant company of its size that owns and operates all its restaurants. Chipotle is ranked on the Fortune 500 and is recognized on the 2021 lists for Forbes&#x2019; America&#x2019;s Best Employers and Fortune&#x2019;s Most Admired Companies. With nearly 100,000 employees passionate about providing a great guest experience, Chipotle is a longtime leader and innovator in the food industry. Chipotle is committed to making its food more accessible to everyone while continuing to be a brand with a demonstrated purpose as it leads the way in digital, technology and sustainable business practices. For more information or to place an order online, visit </font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;text-transform:uppercase;color:#C08C19;background-color: #FFFFFF;">WWW.CHIPOTLE.COM</font><font style="display: inline;color:#000000;">.</font>
		</p>
		<p style="margin:13.5pt 0pt 0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">

		</p>
		<p><font size="1"> </font></p><div style="width:100%">

		<p style="margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 12pt">

			<font style="display: inline;">&nbsp;</font>

		</p>

</div><hr size="3" style="color:#999999" width="100%" align="center"></hr><p style="page-break-after:always">&nbsp;</p><div style="width:100%">

		<p style="margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">

			<font style="display: inline;">&nbsp;</font>

		</p>

</div>
		<p style="margin:13.5pt 0pt 0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;;font-size: 10pt"><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;font-weight:bold;color:#000000;">Forward-Looking Statements </font>
		</p>
		<p style="margin:4.5pt 0pt 0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">
			<font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;font-style:italic;">Certain statements in this press release are forward-looking statements as defined in the Private Securities Litigation Reform Act of 1995, including statements about our goals for number of Chipotle restaurants, restaurants with Chipotlanes and rate of expansion, first quarter 2022 comparable restaurant sales, estimated tax rates, future cash flow, and future long-term prospects. We use words such as &#x201C;anticipate&#x201D;, &#x201C;believe&#x201D;, &#x201C;could&#x201D;, &#x201C;should&#x201D;, &#x201C;may&#x201D;, &#x201C;approximately&#x201D;, &#x201C;estimate&#x201D;, &#x201C;expect&#x201D;, &#x201C;potential&#x201D;, &#x201C;intend&#x201D;, &#x201C;project&#x201D;, &#x201C;encouraged&#x201D;, &#x201C;target&#x201D;, and similar terms and phrases, including references to assumptions, to identify forward-looking statements. The forward-looking statements in this press release are based on currently available operating, financial and competitive information available to us as of the date of this release and we assume no obligation to update these forward-looking statements. These statements are subject to risks and uncertainties that could cause actual results to differ materially from those described in the statements, including but not limited to: uncertainty regarding the duration and severity of the ongoing COVID-19 pandemic and its ultimate impact on our business, including supply chain disruptions and difficulties in acquiring restaurant equipment, impact on guest traffic, restaurant sales and operating costs and the ability of our third-party suppliers and business partners to fulfill their responsibilities and commitments; increasing wage inflation and the increasingly competitive labor market, which impacts our ability to attract and retain qualified employees and has resulted in occasional staffing shortages; increasing supply costs, including beef and freight and to a lesser extent, avocados; risks associated with our reliance on certain information technology systems and potential failures or interruptions; privacy and cyber security risks related to our acceptance of electronic payments or electronic processing of confidential customer or employee information, including through our digital app; the impact of competition, including from sources outside the restaurant industry; the financial impact of increasing our national average hourly wage to $15.00; the impact of federal, state or local government regulations relating to our employees, employment practices, restaurant design and construction, and the sale of food or alcoholic beverages; our ability to achieve our planned growth, such as the availability of suitable new restaurant sites and the availability of construction materials and contractors; increases in ingredient and other operating costs due to our Food With Integrity philosophy, tariffs or trade restrictions and supply shortages; the uncertainty of our ability to achieve expected levels of comparable restaurant sales due to factors such as changes in consumers' perceptions of our brand, including as a result of actual or rumored food safety concerns or other negative publicity, decreased overall consumer spending (including but not limited to the increase in unemployment caused by COVID-19), or the inability to increase menu prices or realize the benefits of menu price increases; risks associated with our increased focus on our digital business, including risks arising from our reliance on third party delivery services; risks relating to litigation, including possible governmental actions related to food safety incidents and potential class action litigation regarding employment laws, advertising claims or other matters; and other risk factors described from time to time in our SEC reports, including our annual report on Form 10-K and quarterly reports on Form 10-Q, all of which are available on the investor relations page of our website at ir.Chipotle.com.</font><font style="display: inline;font-family:Calibri;font-style:italic;">&nbsp;</font>
		</p>

</div><hr size="3" style="color:#999999" width="100%" align="center"></hr><p style="page-break-after:always">&nbsp;</p><div style="width:100%">

		<p style="margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">

			<font style="display: inline;">&nbsp;</font>

		</p>

</div>
		<p style="margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;;font-size: 10pt"><font style="display: inline;font-weight:bold;"></font>
		</p>
		<p style="margin:13.5pt 0pt 0pt;text-align:center;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">
			<a name="_Hlk30523446"></a><font style="display: inline;font-weight:bold;">C</font><font style="display: inline;font-weight:bold;">HIPOTLE MEXICAN GRILL, INC.</font>
		</p>
		<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 3pt;text-align:center;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">
			<font style="display: inline;font-weight:bold;">R</font><font style="display: inline;font-weight:bold;">ECONCILIATION OF NON-GAAP FINANCIAL MEASURES</font>
		</p>
		<p style="margin:13pt 0pt 9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">
			<font style="display: inline;">The following tables provide a reconciliation of non-GAAP financial measures presented in the text above to the most directly comparable financial measures calculated and presented in accordance with GAAP. </font>
		</p>
		<p style="margin:4.5pt 0pt 9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">
			<font style="display: inline;">Adjusted net income is net income excluding expenses related to </font><font style="display: inline;color:#000000;">restaurant asset impairment, corporate restructuring, legal proceedings, stock-</font><font style="display: inline;">based compensation modification expense, and certain other costs. Adjusted general and administrative expense is general and administrative expense excluding transformation expenses, legal proceedings, stock-based compensation modification expense, and certain other costs. The adjusted effective income tax rate is the effective income tax rate adjusted to reflect the after tax impact of non-GAAP adjustments. Restaurant Level Operating Margin, a non-GAAP financial measure, is equal to the revenues generated by our restaurants less their direct operating costs which consist of food, beverage and packaging, labor, occupancy and other operating costs. This performance measure primarily includes the costs that restaurant level managers can directly control and excludes other operating costs that are essential to conduct our business. Management uses restaurant level operating margin as a measure of restaurant performance. Management believes restaurant level operating margin is useful to investors in that it highlights trends in our core business that may not otherwise be apparent to investors when relying solely on GAAP financial measures. We present these non-GAAP measures in order to facilitate meaningful evaluation of our operating performance across periods. These adjustments are intended to provide greater transparency of underlying performance and to allow investors to evaluate our business on the same basis as our management, which uses these non-GAAP measures in evaluating the company&#x2019;s performance. Our adjusted net income, adjusted diluted earnings per share, adjusted general and administrative expenses, adjusted effective income tax rate and restaurant level operating margin measures may not be comparable to other companies&#x2019; adjusted measures. These adjustments are not necessarily indicative of what our actual financial performance would have been during the periods presented and should be viewed in addition to, and not as an alternative to, our results prepared in accordance with GAAP. Further details regarding these adjustments are included in the tables below.</font>
		</p>
		<p style="margin:0pt;text-align:center;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">

		</p>
		<p><font size="1"> </font></p><div style="width:100%">

		<p style="margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 12pt">

			<font style="display: inline;">&nbsp;</font>

		</p>

</div><hr size="3" style="color:#999999" width="100%" align="center"></hr><p style="page-break-after:always">&nbsp;</p><div style="width:100%">

		<p style="margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">

			<font style="display: inline;">&nbsp;</font>

		</p>

</div>
		<p style="margin:0pt;text-align:center;font-family:Times New Roman;;font-size: 10pt"><font style="display: inline;font-weight:bold;">CHIPOTLE MEXICAN GRILL, INC.</font>
		</p>
		<p style="margin:0pt;text-align:center;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">

				<td valign="bottom" style="width:10.70%;border-top:2pt double #000000 ;border-left:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-right:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;padding:0pt;">
					<p style="margin:0pt;text-align:right;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">
						&nbsp;</p>
				</td>
				<td valign="bottom" style="width:01.58%;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-left:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-right:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;padding:0pt;">
					<p style="margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">
						&nbsp;</p>
				</td>
				<td valign="bottom" style="width:01.58%;border-top:2pt double #000000 ;border-left:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-right:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;padding:0pt;">
					<p style="margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">
						&nbsp;</p>
				</td>
				<td valign="bottom" style="width:10.66%;border-top:2pt double #000000 ;border-left:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-right:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;padding:0pt;">
					<p style="margin:0pt;text-align:right;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">
						&nbsp;</p>
				</td>
			</tr>
			<tr>
				<td colspan="12" valign="bottom" style="width:00.02%;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-left:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-right:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;padding:0pt;">
					<p style="margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">
						<font style="display: inline;color:#000000;">(1) Transformation expenses include duplicate rent expense for office and restaurant closures announced in June 2018 due to the corporate restructuring and underperformance of $1,249 and $5,116 for the three months and year ended December 31, 2021, respectively, and employee related restructuring costs of $54 and $449 for the three months and year ended December 31, 2021, respectively.</font></p>
				</td>
			</tr>
			<tr>
				<td colspan="12" valign="bottom" style="width:00.02%;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-left:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-right:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;padding:0pt;">
					<p style="margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">
						<font style="display: inline;color:#000000;">(2) Charges relate to estimated settlements for distinct legal matters that exceeded or are expected to exceed typical costs for these types of legal proceedings.</font></p>
				</td>
			</tr>
			<tr>
				<td colspan="12" valign="bottom" style="width:00.02%;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-left:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-right:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;padding:0pt;">
					<p style="margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">
						<font style="display: inline;color:#000000;">(3) For the three months ended December 31, 2021 and 2020, and year ended December 31, 2021, stock-based compensation consists of a COVID-19 related modification made in December 2020 to our 2018 performance shares. For the year ended December 31, 2020, stock-based compensation consists of a March 2020 modification associated with the departure of our former Executive Chairman primarily related to his 2017 agreement, and costs of a COVID-19 related modification made in December 2020 to our 2018 performance shares. </font></p>
				</td>
			</tr>
			<tr>
				<td colspan="12" valign="bottom" style="width:00.02%;border-top:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-left:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-bottom:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;border-right:1pt none #D9D9D9 ;padding:0pt;">
					<p style="margin:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size: 10pt">
						<font style="display: inline;color:#000000;">(4) Other adjustments consist of consulting fees associated with the calculation of our non-recurring tax benefit.</font></p>
				</td>
			</tr>

// Edgar(tm) Renderer was created by staff of the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission.  Data and content created by government employees within the scope of their employment are not subject to domestic copyright protection. 17 U.S.C. 105.
var Show={};Show.LastAR=null,Show.showAR=function(a,r,w){if(Show.LastAR)Show.hideAR();var e=a;while(e&&e.nodeName!='TABLE')e=e.nextSibling;if(!e||e.nodeName!='TABLE'){var ref=((window)?w.document:document).getElementById(r);if(ref){e=ref.cloneNode(!0);
e.removeAttribute('id');a.parentNode.appendChild(e)}}
if(e)e.style.display='block';Show.LastAR=e};Show.hideAR=function(){Show.LastAR.style.display='none'};Show.toggleNext=function(a){var e=a;while(e.nodeName!='DIV')e=e.nextSibling;if(!e.style){}else if(!e.style.display){}else{var d,p_;if(e.style.display=='none'){d='block';p='-'}else{d='none';p='+'}
e.style.display=d;if(a.textContent){a.textContent=p+a.textContent.substring(1)}else{a.innerText=p+a.innerText.substring(1)}}}
</TEXT>

/* Updated 2009-11-04 */
/* v2.2.0.24 */

/* DefRef Styles */
..report table.authRefData{
	background-color: #def;
	border: 2px solid #2F4497;
	font-size: 1em;
	position: absolute;
}

..report table.authRefData a {
	display: block;
	font-weight: bold;
}

..report table.authRefData p {
	margin-top: 0px;
}

..report table.authRefData .hide {
	background-color: #2F4497;
	padding: 1px 3px 0px 0px;
	text-align: right;
}

..report table.authRefData .hide a:hover {
	background-color: #2F4497;
}

..report table.authRefData .body {
	height: 150px;
	overflow: auto;
	width: 400px;
}

..report table.authRefData table{
	font-size: 1em;
}

/* Report Styles */
..pl a, .pl a:visited {
	color: black;
	text-decoration: none;
}

/* table */
..report {
	background-color: white;
	border: 2px solid #acf;
	clear: both;
	color: black;
	font: normal 8pt Helvetica, Arial, san-serif;
	margin-bottom: 2em;
}

..report hr {
	border: 1px solid #acf;
}

/* Top labels */
..report th {
	background-color: #acf;
	color: black;
	font-weight: bold;
	text-align: center;
}

..report th.void	{
	background-color: transparent;
	color: #000000;
	font: bold 10pt Helvetica, Arial, san-serif;
	text-align: left;
}

..report .pl {
	text-align: left;
	vertical-align: top;
	white-space: normal;
	width: 200px;
	white-space: normal; /* word-wrap: break-word; */
}

..report td.pl a.a {
	cursor: pointer;
	display: block;
	width: 200px;
	overflow: hidden;
}

..report td.pl div.a {
	width: 200px;
}

..report td.pl a:hover {
	background-color: #ffc;
}

/* Header rows... */
..report tr.rh {
	background-color: #acf;
	color: black;
	font-weight: bold;
}

/* Calendars... */
..report .rc {
	background-color: #f0f0f0;
}

/* Even rows... */
..report .re, .report .reu {
	background-color: #def;
}

..report .reu td {
	border-bottom: 1px solid black;
}

/* Odd rows... */
..report .ro, .report .rou {
	background-color: white;
}

..report .rou td {
	border-bottom: 1px solid black;
}

..report .rou table td, .report .reu table td {
	border-bottom: 0px solid black;
}

/* styles for footnote marker */
..report .fn {
	white-space: nowrap;
}

/* styles for numeric types */
..report .num, .report .nump {
	text-align: right;
	white-space: nowrap;
}

..report .nump {
	padding-left: 2em;
}

..report .nump {
	padding: 0px 0.4em 0px 2em;
}

/* styles for text types */
..report .text {
	text-align: left;
	white-space: normal;
}

..report .text .big {
	margin-bottom: 1em;
	width: 17em;
}

..report .text .more {
	display: none;
}

..report .text .note {
	font-style: italic;
	font-weight: bold;
}

..report .text .small {
	width: 10em;
}

..report sup {
	font-style: italic;
}

..report .outerFootnotes {
	font-size: 1em;
}
